overview: When the girl returns home, her husband drives her away with her things. The embarrassed girl goes on a trip to the city to find an answer on how to live. On her way, the girl meets lovers who give her a balloon; a couple with cloth-covered faces; suicide; a man performing a funeral ritual and mentally ill in a straitjacket. Who are all these people and will they help the abandoned girl find the answer to her question?
title: Outcast
